Package com.adobe.creativesdk.foundation.auth

This package provides classes related to Authentation of Users.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AdobeAuthSessionHelper.IAdobeAuthStatusCallback
    The IAdobeAuthStatusCallback interface is used to receive authentication status and results of authentication operations.
    IAdobeAuthClientCredentials
    IAdobeAuthClientCredentials is used to provide application's client credentials.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdobeAuthSessionHelper
    AdobeAuthSessionHelper is used to retrieve the current status and results of authentication related operations.
    AdobeAuthSessionLauncher
    AdobeAuthSessionLauncher provides necessary information to launch the User Auth UI.
    AdobeAuthSessionLauncher.Builder
    The builder object used to construct an AdobeAuthSessionLauncher object.
    AdobeAuthUserProfile
    AdobeAuthUserProfile contains the properties of the currently logged in user as obtained by calling AdobeUXAuthManager.getUserProfile().
    AdobeClientScope
    AdobeClientScope specifies various IMS scopes.
    AdobeUXAuthManager
    AdobeUXAuthManager manages Adobe Creative Cloud authentication, and is the starting point for using the Creative SDK.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AdobeAuthErrorCode
    AdobeAuthErrorCode is an enum for authentication-related error codes.
    AdobeAuthSessionHelper.AdobeAuthStatus
    Enumeration for the authentication status
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AdobeAuthException
    AdobeAuthException is an error object passed in case of authentication failure.

Package com.adobe.creativesdk.foundation.auth Description

This package provides classes related to Authentation of Users.
